BlockEntry.description: Indicates if subscription is blocked for time cost entry

Classification.description: Guid ID of classification, to filter the report based on the classification of a subscription

ClassificationCode.description: Code of classification, to filter the report based on the classification of a subscription

ClassificationDescription.description: Description of classification, to filter the report based on the classification of a subscription

Created.description: Date when the subscription was created

Creator.description: The Guid ID of the user that created the subscription

CreatorFullName.description: The full name of the user that created the subscription

Currency.description: Currency code used in the transactions

CustomerPONumber.description: Purchase order number of that is linked to customer

Division.description: Division number of the company that the subscription is linked to

EndDate.description: The date and time when the subscription ends

InvoiceDay.description: For monthly, quaterly, half-year and yearly invoice period, the day number of the month when the invoice of the subscription is sent.  While for weekly invoice period, the weekday number of the week when the invoice of the subscription is sent: 0=Monday 1=Tuesday 2=Wednesday 3=Thursday  4=Friday 5=Saturday 6=Sunday

InvoicedTo.description: The date when the invoice of the subscription is sent

InvoiceTo.description: The account which the subsciption is invoiced to

InvoiceToContactPerson.description: The ID of the contact person that is linked to the account the subscription is invoice to

InvoiceToContactPersonFullName.description: The name of the contact person that is linked to the account the subscription is invoice to

InvoiceToName.description: Name of the account to invoice to

InvoicingStartDate.description: Date to start invoicing the account

Modified.description: Date and time when the subscription has been modified

Modifier.description: The ID of the user that modified the subscription

ModifierFullName.description: The name of the user that modified the subscription

Notes.description: For additional information regarding the subscription

OrderedBy.description: Reference to order account, GUID ID of the subscriber

OrderedByContactPerson.description: Reference of contact person of order account, displays the contact name of the subscriber

OrderedByContactPersonFullName.description: Name of contact person of order account, displays the full contact name of the subscriber

OrderedByName.description: Name of order account, displays the name of the subscriber

Printed.description: Indicates if subscription has been printed

Project.description: The Guid ID of the project, reference to Project endpoint

ReasonCancelled.description: Guid ID of the reason of cancellation record linked to the subscription

ReasonCancelledCode.description: Code of the reason of cancellation record linked to the subscription

ReasonCancelledDescription.description: Description of the reason of cancellation record linked to the subscription

SubscriptionType.description: The GUID ID of the subscription condition, reference to SubscriptionType endpoint

SubscriptionTypeCode.description: The code of the subscription condition record

SubscriptionTypeDescription.description: The code of the subscription condition description
